name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "vecto",
  "jest": {
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "coverageReporters": [
      "lcov",
      "text-summary"
    ],
    "coverageDirectory": "./coverage"
  },
  "version": "0.7.8",
  "description": "A JS mini library to deal with ndarrays and vectors",
  "main": "vecto.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "build": "webpack",
    "coverage": "cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/abtexp/vecto.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "ndarray",
    "vectors"
  ],
  "author": "abtExp <atworkstudios@gmail.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/abtexp/vecto/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://abtexp.github.io/vecto",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "benchmark": "^2.1.4",
    "coveralls": "^2.13.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "gpu.js": "0.0.0",
    "istanbul": "^0.4.5",
    "jest": "^20.0.4",
    "lodash": "^4.17.4",
    "uglify-js": "^3.1.0",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^0.4.6",
    "webpack": "^3.5.5"
  }
}
name: package.json
